info.name: Wide_dark VK.com
info.description: Dark theme for VK.com Тема VK, для тех кто любит посидеть ночью за ПК :) I'll be glad to know your opinion, suggestions and bug reports
info.additionalInfo:
+ new logo & background
+ more dark
+ new scrollbar
+ more more dark :)
+ cursor
+ fixed img size
+ fixed song name
